title: Ticket #1075: RESERVED_SWAP=0 broken
description:
See https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=548090

This change requires a version history note: RESERVED_SWAP did not default to 0, which disables swap size checks in condor_shadow and condor_shadow.std.
check_ins: 2009-Dec-18 07:55   Check-in [16720]: RESERVED_SWAP did not default to 0, disabling swap tests. It defaulted to 5. condor_shadow and condor_shadow.std had a default of 5 for RESERVED_SWAP condor_shadow.std also did not honor RESERVED_SWAP=0 as a means to disable the swap tests (By Matthew Farrellee )
creator: matt
